SEARCH
Package seng201.team005.gui

Class ScreenController

java.lang.Object
seng201.team005.gui.ScreenController
Direct Known Subclasses:
MenuGarageController, MenuMainController, MenuRaceController, MenuResultsController, MenuSetupCarsController, MenuSetupSettingsController, MenuShopController, OwnedItemsController, RaceConfirmController, RaceSetupController, RouteSetupController
public abstract class ScreenController extends Object
Abstract parent class for all GameEnvironment UI controller classes.

This class provides common functionality and properties for managing the game's UI screens. It includes methods for updating UI elements, handling button selections, and displaying stats for various game objects.

    • buttonSelector

      protected void buttonSelector(List<javafx.scene.control.ToggleButton> buttonList, int buttonIndex)
      Updates the selection state of a list of toggle buttons.

      The button at the specified index is selected, and all other buttons are deselected.

      Parameters:
      buttonList - The list of toggle buttons to update.
      buttonIndex - The index of the button to select.

    • updatePlayerMoneyText

      protected void updatePlayerMoneyText()
      Updates the player's money display in the UI.

    • displayStats

      protected void displayStats(Purchasable purchasable)
      Displays the stats of a given Purchasable object in the UI.

      This method updates the UI elements to show the stats of the specified purchasable item, such as speed, handling, reliability, fuel economy, and overall performance.

      Parameters:
      purchasable - The purchasable item whose stats are to be displayed.

    • displayCarPlusPartStats

      protected void displayCarPlusPartStats(Car car, Part part)
      Displays the combined stats of a Car and a Part in the UI.

      This method calculates the adjusted stats of the car when the part is applied and updates the UI elements to show the combined stats.

      Parameters:
      car - The car whose stats are to be displayed.
      part - The part to be applied to the car.

    • addMoney

      public void addMoney(int money)
      Adds the specified amount of money to the player's total.
      Parameters:
      money - The amount of money to add.
